name: Excel Content Sync
description: Decouple and Sync multi-language content between Excel and Sketch
author: Wouter Bron

commands.name: Select Content File...
commands.description: Select the Excel or CSV file that contains the content.

commands.name: Sync Current Page...
commands.description: Sync content from Excel file to this page.

commands.name: Sync All Pages...
commands.description: Sync content from Excel file to all pages (except Symbols).

commands.name: Generate Content File...
commands.description: Generate Excel file with keys and values from the current Sketch document.

commands.name: Report Issue or Feedback
commands.description: Report Issue, Feedback or Feature on Github.
